name: 4DSnake
description: Wait? 4 Dimensions? I thought there were only 3? Yes partially true. There are three dimensions that are visible in the physical world. However that doesn't stop us from experiencing higher dimensions digitally. This is what 4DSnake is all about.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: May also work on previous versions of Windows
